column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I ordered the Denver skillet with cinnamon roll pancakes and a side of fruit
column2: all to share with hubs.  For something fairly simple
column3: it was all so delicious!  The hashbrowns were cooked perfectly
column6: anyway) amount of crunch.  Flavorful veggies
column8: and a nice amount of melty cheese topped with perfectly cooked eggs.  The cinnamon roll pancakes were awesome and even though we were full we had to finish them off.  It's making me hungry just writing this review.
